Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Androctonus defensin (AaDfsin; natural AMPs; UCSS1a; 3S=S, scorpions, arachnids,  Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: this Androctonus defensin presents only two differences from the defensin of the scorpion L. quinquestriatus at positions 6 and 28, where A F and a n L are interconverted. Isolated and sequenced.Activity: active against Gram+ bacteria S. aureus ATCC6538 or AB94004 (MIC 0.25-1.33 uM) and S. epidermidis (MIC 0.5 uM) (Yang et al., 2024). Updated 7/2021; 11/2024
Literature Information.Author: Ehret-Sabatier L, Loew D, Goyffon M, Fehlbaum P, Hoffmann JA, van Dorsselaer A, Bulet P.1996
Literature Information.Title: Characterization of novel cysteine-rich antimicrobial peptides from scorpion blood.
